actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution authorizing establishment of Office of Parliamentarian of House of Representatives.

summary.text: Establishes within the House of Representatives the Office of the Parliamentarian. Vests the administration of such Office in the Parliamentarian who shall be appointed by the Speaker of the House. Requires the Parliamentarian to appoint certain staff members, including a Deputy Parliamentarian.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing establishment of Office of Parliamentarian of House of Representatives.
